name: ReconstructDFTconstraint
label: Reconstruct (Constraint based Direct Fourier)
description: Reconstruct a tilt series using constraint-based Direct Fourier method. The tilt axis must be parallel to the x-direction and centered in the y-direction. The size of reconstruction will be (Nx,Ny,Ny). Reconstructing a 512x512x512 tomogram typically takes xxxx mins.

parameters.name: supportSigma
parameters.label: Sigma multiplier for Fourier Gaussian filter

parameters.name: supportThreshold
parameters.label: Percent of smallest values to set to 0

parameters.name: seed
parameters.label: Random Number Generator Seed
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator used to create the initial guess. The seed is kept here so that when the pipeline is re-ran, the results are reproducible
